pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Gamma Overnight Glow 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors Gamma Overnight Glow™ renews skin complexion in just 2 weeks. 50ml.

Skin Doctors Gamma Overnight Glow™ is an ultra concentrated time released chemical peel with added Vitamin A that gives salon treatment results in an at-home cream.
It helps to:
Gently exfoliate, sloughing off the top layer of damaged skin, improving skin texture, clarity and reducing pore size
Smooth wrinkles and improve skin tone
Reduce acne scaring, blackheads and whiteheads
Reduce skin pigmentation
Stimulate collagen, repairs and firms the skin
Recommended for: All skin types, caution sensitive skin. Not for use in pregnancy Skin that requires deep exfoliation and resurfacingUneven, dull skins, scarring, open pores, deep lines and wrinkles and pigmentation

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:Glycolic Acid - a type of Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) known as â€œfruit acidsâ€ naturally occurring in sugar cane juice. It is the most effective AHA due to it's small molecular structure that allows it to penetrate the surface of the skin more readily. It acts as a mild exfoliant to remove dry skin cells and enhance cell turnover.Lactic Acid - a type of Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) derived from sour milk, it exfoliates by loosening or breaking up the thick outer layer of the skin. This exfoliation, or epidermal shedding, smoothes the skin's texture and stimulates natural skin cell regeneration. It also increases the water holding ability of the skin, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.Salicylic Acid - a type of Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) which encourages sloughing of dead skin cells and has the ability to penetrate into the pore to clear out and unclog.Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A) - increases cell renewal, evens the skin tone, improves the texture and firmness of the skin.Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice - extracted from the leaf of the aloe plant, it helps rebalance the pH level in the skin acting as a gentle astringent, firming and toning, as well as protecting the skin against blemishes. Aloe Vera creates a barrier that prevents moisture loss from the skin and carries important nutrients and moisture through the many layers of the skin down tothe dermis, stimulating cells responsible for the manufacture of collagen. It also soothes the skin and reduces redness and swelling.All Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycolic Acid,Benzophenone-3, Propylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Lactic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Salicylic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Retinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool.

Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage, avoid the eye area. Process: After cleansing with Skin Doctors™ pH balancing cleanser, massage a pea sized amount of gamma hydroxy™ forte evenly over face, neck and décolletage. A slight tingling sensation is normal. Best results: Can be used morning or night for intense resurfacing. Can be used once or twice weekly for maintenance. Use in conjunction with Skin Doctors™ supermoist spf50 for daily sun protection and supermoist 24hr hydrator of an evening.
